CustomField.description: This field identifies the class to be used as a Log Finalizer, which can be dynamically loaded using the rflib_LoggerUtil.createLogFinalizer() method. This class will then be instantiated and used to create the logger instance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please provide the name of the Apex class implementing the rflib_LogFinalizer interface. This class will be dynamically instantiated and can be attached as a Finalizer. Please use caution when changing the default value.
CustomField.label: Log Finalizer Class
